Class ChatMessageManager

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class ChatMessageManager
extends RestManager
    Manages the chat messages.

    • Method Detail

      • createChannelMessage

        public ChatMessage createChannelMessage(String channelId,
                                        String content,
                                        Embed[] embeds,
                                        String[] replyMessageIds,
                                        Boolean isPrivate,
                                        Boolean isSilent)
        Create a channel message.
        https://www.guilded.gg/docs/api/chat/ChannelMessageCreate
        Parameters:
        channelId - The ID of the channel.
        content - The message content to create.
        embeds - Rich content sections associated with the message (can be null).
        replyMessageIds - The ID of the message(s) to reply to (maximum of 5, null if not replying).
        isPrivate - If set, this message will only be seen by those mentioned or replied to.
        isSilent - If set, this message will not notify any mentioned users or roles.
        Returns:
        The newly created message's ChatMessage object.

      • deleteChannelMessage

        public void deleteChannelMessage(String channelId,
                                 String messageId)
        Delete a channel message.
        https://www.guilded.gg/docs/api/chat/ChannelMessageDelete
        Parameters:
        channelId - The ID of the channel.
        messageId - The ID of the message.

      • updateChannelMessage

        public ChatMessage updateChannelMessage(String channelId,
                                        String messageId,
                                        String content,
                                        Embed[] embeds)
        Update a channel message.
        https://www.guilded.gg/docs/api/chat/ChannelMessageUpdate
        Parameters:
        channelId - The ID of the channel.
        messageId - The ID of the message.
        content - The message content to update.
        embeds - The message embeds to update.
        Returns:
        the updated message's ChatMessage object.

      • getChannelMessage

        public ChatMessage getChannelMessage(String channelId,
                                     String messageId)
        Get details for a specific chat message from a chat channel.
        https://www.guilded.gg/docs/api/chat/ChannelMessageRead
        Parameters:
        channelId - The ID of the channel.
        messageId - The ID of the message.
        Returns:
        ChatMessage object of the message with the given UUID.

      • getChannelMessages

        public ChatMessage[] getChannelMessages(String channelId)
        Get a list of the latest 50 messages from a channel.
        https://www.guilded.gg/docs/api/chat/ChannelMessageReadMany
        Parameters:
        channelId - The ID of the channel.
        Returns:
        A ChatMessage[] that contains up to 100 ChatMessage objects.

      • getChannelMessages

        public ChatMessage[] getChannelMessages(String channelId,
                                        GObjectQuery query)
        Get a list of the messages using a query.
        Parameters:
        channelId - ID of the channel that the messages exist in.
        query - The query to search for.
        Returns:
        ChatMessage[]

      • addReaction

        public void addReaction(String channelId,
                        String messageId,
                        int emoteId)
        Add a reaction emote to a chat message.
        https://www.guilded.gg/docs/api/reactions/ContentReactionCreate
        Parameters:
        channelId - Channel UUID where the chat message exists.
        messageId - The UUID of the chat message.
        emoteId - The ID of the emote to add.

      • removeReaction

        public void removeReaction(String channelId,
                           String messageId,
                           int emoteId)
        Remove a reaction emote of a chat message.
        https://www.guilded.gg/docs/api/reactions/ContentReactionDelete
        Parameters:
        channelId - Channel UUID where the chat message exists.
        messageId - The UUID of the chat message.
        emoteId - The ID of the emote to delete.
